transport.question: I have wheels and go 'Vroom Vroom!' What am I?

hints.text: 🚗 You see me on the road.
🚦 I stop at red lights.
👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 I can carry your family.

transport.question: I float on the water and carry people. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I go in the ocean.
⚓ I have a big anchor.
🚢 I'm bigger than a little boat.

transport.question: I fly in the sky and take people far away. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I go past the clouds.
✈️ I have wings.
🌍 I can travel to other countries.

transport.question: I have two wheels and you pedal me. What am I?

hints.text: 👧 You can ride me in the park
🦵 You use your legs to make me move.
🔔 I might have a bell to ring.

transport.question: I drive on tracks and carry many people. What am I?

hints.text: 🛤️ I follow a special path.
📣 You hear a 'choo choo!' sound.
🧑‍🤝‍🧑 Lots of people can ride me together.

transport.question: I am a large vehicle that is typically yellow and takes kids to school. What am I?

hints.text: 🛑 I am yellow.
🎒 I stop to pick up kids.
👦 I take you to school safely.

transport.question: I have a siren and help people in emergencies. What am I?

hints.text: 🚨 I go 'wee-ooh, wee-ooh!'
🚑 I take people to the hospital.
👩‍⚕️ Doctors and nurses ride in me.

transport.question: I am like a motorcycle, but I have 3 wheels. What am I?

hints.text: 🛵 I am fun to ride
🪖 You should wear a helmet when riding me.
👧 You ride me outside.

transport.question: I can fly without wings. People use me to go to space! What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 I go very fast!
👨‍🚀 Astronauts ride in me.
✨ I travel to the moon and stars.

transport.question: I help put out fires. I have a hose and a siren. What am I?

hints.text: 🚒 I am red.
💦 I spray water on fires.
🔥 I help firefighters.

plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Bunnies like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I'm orange sometimes, but I'm green too!
🐇 I'm yummy for bunnies.
🌱 I grow under the ground.

plant.question: I have petals and smell sweet. Bees love to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I come in lots of different colors!
🐝 Bees like to collect food from me.
🌷 I grow in gardens.

plant.question: I am big and tall and have leaves. Birds like to build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I am very strong and stand for many years!
🐿️ Squirrels also like to climb me.
🍃 My leaves change color in the fall.

plant.question: I am a fruit that grows on a tree. I am red or green and yummy to eat. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 Sometimes I am given to teachers
🥧 People make pie out of me
🐛 Sometimes a worm lives inside me

plant.question: I am long and green and grow on a vine. I'm often pickled! What am I?

hints.text: 🥪 You can put me in a sandwich, but some people don't like it.
🥒 I can be sour.
🥗 I'm crunchy and refreshing in a salad.

plant.question: I have a hard shell and grow on a tree. Squirrels love to hide me in the ground. What am I?

hints.text: 🌰 I fall from trees in the autumn.
🐿️ Squirrels collect me for the winter.
💪 I am a type of nut

plant.question: I'm a vegetable with many layers. I can make you cry when you cut me. What am I?

hints.text: 🧅 I have a strong smell.
😭 I might make your eyes water.
🍔 You can chop me up and put me on a burger.

plant.question: I am a plant that has sharp needles and stays green all year long. What am I?

hints.text: 🎄 People decorate me during Christmas.
🌲 I'm shaped like a triangle.
🐻 Bears like to live near me in the forest.

plant.question: I am a seed that pops when it gets hot. You can eat me at the movies. What am I?

hints.text: 🍿 People put butter and salt on me.
🌽 I come from a cob
🔥 I need to be cooked before you can eat me

plant.question: I am a prickly plant that lives in the desert. I can store water for a long time. What am I?

hints.text: 🌵 I have spikes to protect myself.
🏜️ You can find me in very dry places.
🐪 Animals drink water from me when they're thirsty.
